name: 2048 King The Crown - Medieval Puzzle Tiles Free
name_original: 2048 King The Crown - Medieval Puzzle Tiles Free
description: This is the next generation of 2048 number puzzles. This super addictive game has you combining peasants to make minstrels, minstrels to make soldiers, soliders to make knights.  All the way up until you make the king. This fantastically fun puzzle will keep you entertained for hours.
